posts.message: Security Vulnerability affecting MySQL <= 5.7.14, MariaDB and PerconaDB
posts.caption: securityaffairs.co
posts.description: The security expert Dawid Golunski disclosed critical vulnerabilities in MySQL, MariaDB and PerconaDB can lead fully compromise of servers.

posts.message:
Hello Guys. look, 
early this year i asked you if i should put my time on js/ruby instead of php. 
& by your help i have chosen js & it was the best thing i did all year. i can do things now that i didn't even know it can be done. 
js really made my life easier. 
every complicated task i have ever had wes suddenly easier & faster to implement: ( nodejs / gulp / yeoman / webpack / react / angular / ionic / electron )

but i need you again now. over the last year i have noticed that the (go) community is growing larger & larger. 
should i focus on getting better with nodejs & the rest of js world. 
or i should put my free time on learning (go).

will learning go & mastering it provide me with better jobs than i can get with node //& is go needed in the freelancing community yet or it's just for big company ???

Dears
I need software to project my mobile screen to my lab-top screen.
your help is much appreciated.

انا عندى مشكله بقالى اكتر من 3 سعات بدورلها على حل وكل الحلول اللى شفتها عالجيت هب عباره عن حل واحد بيعيد نفسه والسبب فيه ال inline source maps of large concatenated stylesheet وانا معنديش المشكله دى خالص .
انا كل اللى بحاول اعمله انى افتح ال node-inspector لملف index.js وربنا :D
عملت node-inspector فى ال node command line وقالى :
Node Inspector v0.12.8
Visit http://127.0.0.1:8080/?port=5858 to start debugging.
تمام لحد هنا وبيفتح معايه ال node-inspector عادى ,, رحت فاتح node command line تانى ورحت لل path بتاع الملف وقلتله node --debug-brk index علشان يفتحلى ملف ال index واعمله debug وقالى :
Debugger listening on [::]:5858
وكده الدنيا تمام ,, اجى فى البراوزر افتح نفس اللينك اللى كان شغال اللى هو :
http://127.0.0.1:8080/?port=5858
مش بيرضى يفتح بأه وبيجبلى الرساله اللى فى الصوره دى وانا مش عارف احلها ازاى لحد دلوقتى
في اي برنامج اقدر اعرف بيه ( المقاسات بالبكسل - نوع الفونت - اعمل اكستراكت للصور - اعمل "Copy CSS" ) في الـPSD على لينكس ؟
